top_comments.comment: It's always a pleasure dying in your videos
"You as the viewer." Yay, I finally made it to the credits of a music video!

comments_since_last_sample.body: "You as the viewer." Yay, I finally made it to the credits of a music video!
music is great, should have created a new song instead of a cover.
Violet you are awesome! Not to mention you are drop dead beautiful!!!!
Brought back to this video over and over for equal parts the AMAZING cover they did, but also the creative they put into the video itself <3
I've never liked this song ever. Until now. I'm a convert.

Questa cover è una bomba !!!! (Sorry Violet, my italian soul coming out😁), come la precedente di Phill Collins, e il video è semplicemente fantastico, complimenti ragazzi, voi e Violet siete un terzetto formidabile, waiting for the next collabs!!🤟🤟
